rules_text: At the beginning of each end step, if you spent three or more different colors of mana to cast spells this turn, create a 1/1 white creature token. If you spent five or more different colors of mana to cast spells this turn, create another one of those tokens.
rules_text2:
[i](You may cast a legendary instant only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)[/i]
Create four 1/1 white creature tokens, then you gain 1 life for each creature you control.
